topic.title: How to shut down ZeroNet
topic.body: There is question: How to shut down ZeroNet?

1_19Q1vr2EtHe6525gmrD3E7jpvZVBq8YAFP.body:
> [thisguy1337](#comment_33_16bxMyoL49mWYhcZKBYVBT5zEFW9SQpiao): There is the ZeroNet Docs which has quite a large learning curve, but is helpful if you know HTML & CSShttp://127.0.0.1:43110/17Kom2G5qNDc6NaQwv445h1gFzxkY3ZtZe/site_development/getting_started/
> There's also a few video's on youtube videos about the 'clone' feature.https://youtu.be/D-x9Ob7kktE

Cool , thank you!
